1056.issue: [W1056] js-controller 5.0.19 listed as dependency but 6.0.11 is recommended. Please consider updating dependency at [io-package.json](https://github.com/DrozmotiX/ioBroker.opentherm/blob/master/io-package.json).

1078.issue: [W1078] "common.materialize" is deprecated for admin >= 5 at [io-package.json](https://github.com/DrozmotiX/ioBroker.opentherm/blob/master/io-package.json). Please use property "common.adminUI.config".

1081.issue: [W1081] "common.license" in [io-package.json](https://github.com/DrozmotiX/ioBroker.opentherm/blob/master/io-package.json) is deprecated. Please define object "common.licenseInformation"

1084.issue: [W1084] "common.title" is deprecated and replaced by "common.titleLang". Please remove from [io-package.json](https://github.com/DrozmotiX/ioBroker.opentherm/blob/master/io-package.json).

1105.issue: [W1105] [io-package.json](https://github.com/DrozmotiX/ioBroker.opentherm/blob/master/io-package.json) schema validation error: Missing required property "tier" in /common

4038.issue: [S4038] .vscode/settings.json file missing "json.schemas" property. Add schema definitions for better IntelliSense support.

5022.issue: [S5022] Please consider migrating to admin 5 UI (jsonConfig) or react based UI.

5031.issue: [S5031] "gulpfile.js" found in repo while @iobroker/adapter-dev already used. Please check if gulp is still needed.

5033.issue: [W5033] method "createChannel()" is deprecated and will be removed with future js-controller version. Please use "set/deleteObject()" instead.

7001.issue: [E7001] No actual year found in LICENSE. Please add "Copyright (c) 2025 DutchmanNL <rdrozda86@gmail.com>" at the start of LICENSE

8004.issue: [W8004] Please process issue [[#508] "Migration to ESLint 9 and @iobroker/eslint-config"](https://github.com/DrozmotiX/ioBroker.opentherm/issues/508)

9006.issue: [S9006] .commitinfo file should be excluded by .gitignore, please add a line with text ".commitinfo" to .gitignore

0028.issue: [W0028] Minimum node.js version 20 recommended. Please adapt "{'engines' : { 'node' >= '18' } }" to "{'engines' : { 'node' >= '20' } }" at [package.json](https://github.com/DrozmotiX/ioBroker.opentherm/blob/master/package.json).

0050.issue: [W0050] Package 'axios' listed as devDependency at [package.json](https://github.com/DrozmotiX/ioBroker.opentherm/blob/master/package.json) might be obsolete if using '@iobroker/adapter-dev'.
